topic.title: Test Case 2: Use of Para With This-Topic Reference

body.p: This topic contains a conref to a paragraph that contains a this-topic fragment ID reference to the ID "target-section". The expectation is that the reference will be resolved to the section with that ID in this topic, not in the topic that contains the paragraph as authored (the warehouse topic).

section.title: Target Section in Using Topic
section.p: This section is in the topic that uses the paragraph with the this-topic fragment ID by conref.
